name: Michael Satanek
text: The pizza here is absolutely stand out, some of the best Pizza Hut pizza I‚Äôve had.  Many pizza huts have gone down in quality since they started offering delivery and online ordering, but this Pizza Hut is head and shoulders above the others I‚Äôve had.  Absolutely would recommend them!

name: Robby Moore
text: Was a little slow as expected at rush hour, but overall amazing staff, amazing food, and an amazing price! Oh and alot of pinapple....

name: Jason Saville
text: Pizza Hut has the best pizza menu, just like Domino's. But I carefully plan this once in a while.

name: Sean Holcomb
text:
We had a really good dinner there. Waitress took our order when our family arrived,  drinks came out quickly.
The really interesting thing about the dinner was,  another patron who was ‚Ä¶More

name: Shane E
text: I liked this particular Pizza Hut for the ability to pick up my pizza via the Drive-thru.  Always great (Pizza Hut great) pizza until tonight, 04/03/20. ‚Ä¶More

name: Simon Carey
text: Ya know, it‚Äôs a Pizza Hut. Fine pizza, but the Bathroom had a busted lock. Good service tho

name: Lorenzo Johnson
text:
Loved this location and the parking is great,  the food was served cooked perfectly, and I would not miss the buffet if I'm nearby,
The staff could be a bit warmer however overall a good pizza hut.

name: susan brown
text: Best hand-tossed pizza around! Love ordering from Exit 18  Queensbury --- they know I like extra sauce without my asking. Great service staff and a really nice salad bar in a cozy setting.

name: Teresa Zocco
text: Called in a very large order- Colleen and Laurie were  amazing! They had everything ready exactly when I wanted to pick it up and everything was delicious!! Thanks again for helping our party to go smoothly!

name: Alisha Marie Fredericks
text: Service was great.

name: Jocasa Relf
text: Excellent buffet!  Service was excellent too!

name: Kristina Lasher
text: Never seen a Pizza Hut with a drive-thru

name: Eric Conover
text: I have been going here for many, many years. Before I went in this time, I said to the kids "I'd faint if it were the same waitress that was always here in the past." Well, it was! She was nice and gracious, as always, and the pizza & good times were up there, too. I recharged my spiritual batteries!

name: Mickey Lewis
text: Very friendly and they honored a special that the pizza hut on hudson ave would not. I‚Äôm going here for now on.üëçüèª

name: Adam Lawrence
text: Order was messed up several times. They didn't give the typical garlic butter white sauce that I love to get with breadsticks. Pizza was okay at best.

name: Monica Hoffmann
text: What's not to like about Pizza hut?  This particular location is nice because it's out of the way of large gatherings and is quiet and cozy.  Great for a date night.

name: Laurie Gregory-Smith
text: The last two times we went to pizza hut on broad street were not good experiences. They don't honor any of the prices they advertise on tv. The public isn't stupid, we know when an offer is for online orders and when it isn't. Also both ‚Ä¶More

text: Waitress was awesome. They gave us the wrong pizza and let us keep it while they made another.

text: Hate being forced into taking hand tossed since they decided to charge extra for pan pizza(which was the only reason I ordered from there ever). Then was told I was going to have to pay extra for the meat lovers pizza over the listed price.  Get this because it had meat on it! Nothing like cheating people out of money. Garbage!!!!!!
